benchmark_details.name: AvaMERG (Avatar-based Multimodal Empathetic Response Generation)
benchmark_details.overview: AvaMERG is a large-scale benchmark dataset designed for Multimodal Empathetic Response Generation (MERG), which incorporates authentic human speech audio and dynamic talking-face avatar videos along with text, enabling the generation of emotionally nuanced and contextually appropriate responses across multiple modalities.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To establish a comprehensive benchmark for developing and evaluating models that generate empathetic responses across multiple modalities.

data.source: AvaMERG dataset constructed by augmenting the existing Pure-text Empathetic Dialogue dataset with multimodal signals and identity-specific information.
data.annotation: Human annotation with cross-checking for content accuracy and emotional accuracy.

methodology.calculation: Various evaluation scores calculated to assess consistency and quality of generated responses across text, audio, and video outputs.
methodology.interpretation: Scores reflect the emotional accuracy, coherence, and quality of generated multimodal empathetic outputs.
methodology.baseline_results: Results show Empatheia model significantly outperforms baselines on multiple metrics.
methodology.validation: Comprehensive validation through human evaluation and automated metrics on the AvaMERG dataset.

targeted_risks.demographic_analysis: Dataset includes diverse age, gender, and emotional expression profiles.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: Data anonymization and user control over personal data ensured.
ethical_and_legal_considerations.consent_procedures: Informed consent obtained from all participants involved in data collection.
ethical_and_legal_considerations.compliance_with_regulations: ADheres to data protection regulations like GDPR.
